channel.title: Java help
channel.description:
I recently came back from rsps after i quit. I starting coding again and when i tried to compile, it wouldn't work. So first i try the environment variables start testing things there. After a bit I couldn't find the problem so I try to run the client, That wouldn't work now it says 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Can somebody please pm me or post the problem, i know that the environment variables are screwed but i don't know how to fix, this will help a lot. Thank you
~~Andy

item.title: Java help
item.dc:creator: @socceroos11 socceroos11
